quote: As a recluse I couldn't bear traffic. It had nothing to do with jealousy, I simply disliked people, crowds, anywhere, except at my readings. People diminished me, they sucked me dry.
quote_letters: AS A RECLUSE I COULDNT BEAR TRAFFIC IT HAD NOTHING TO DO WITH JEALOUSY I SIMPLY DISLIKED PEOPLE CROWDS ANYWHERE EXCEPT AT MY READINGS PEOPLE DIMINISHED ME THEY SUCKED ME DRY

chat:
condensed - Concentrated liquid or shortened text
helped - Provided assistance or aided someone
attempt - A try or effort to do something
retracted - Pulled back or taken back a statement
low-lying - Located at a lower level or altitude than the surrounding area
enjoyed - Took pleasure in or liked something
Siegfried - Germanic name meaning "victorious peace"
bishops - Senior members of the Christian clergy
uphold - To maintain or support a decision, belief or principle

Oaxaca - City and state in southern Mexico
wartime - The period when a war is going on
sacrificed - Offered something valuable for a greater cause

implied - Suggested or hinted at without being explicitly stated
worthy - Deserving respect or admiration
outsider - Someone who doesn't belong to a group or community
Medici - Famous Italian family known for their influence on Renaissance art and politics
empathy - The ability to understand and share the feelings of others
